title: Create - Chief Gamer Role
body:
Role: Chief Gamer

Purpose: To carry the vision for Gamer DAO. 

Domains:
- Role assignment for the Anchor Squad

Accountabilities:
- Keeping the governance records of this role up-to-date below. Copy and paste approved Snapshot proposal links with the proposal title in Gov. Records section.

- Keeping the governance records of [Gamer DAO (Anchor Squad)](https://www.notion.so/Gamer-DAO-Anchor-Squad-807fda858a5f431c9a569bf85110674c)  up-to-date. Copy and paste approved Snapshot proposal links with the proposal title in Gov. Records section.

- Establish the purpose for the Anchor Squad

- Establish the strategy for the Anchor Squad

- Recruit top talent for Gamer DAO
author: 0x380C7200892581b7392CA00DA759A4072B67460D
